description:
Are you interested in increasing your salary and professional opportunities?

This 40-minute Executive MBA Program course is delivered in 17 bite-sized nuggets to speed you through the decision of pursuing an EMBA. Very quickly you will understand if you are a good candidate now, and how much time and energy it will take to make yourself an outstanding candidate.

  • Learn the key differences between MBA and EMBA programs
  • Understand the specific differences among EMBA programs types
  • Find the EMBA program style that best suits you
  • Identify the school that will best move your career forward
  • Recognize how you will be viewed as a candidate
  • Compare your profile to current EMBA students
  • Learn how to improve your EMBA application

You will leave this course clear on the value of an EMBA with actionable steps to take to move your career forward. Go from good to great!
title: Executive MBA Programs
